title: Freakazoid - Segunda Temporada (DVD-Rip) Dublado Dual-Audio
description:
[English]

This released is aimed mostly at Brazilians, since it contains the Freakazoid 
Season 2 DVD-Rip from FFNDVD and the Brazilian Portuguese Audio Dub ripped/synced 
by me. It is a DualAudio release, so it might be useful for non-native portuguese 
speakers.
